title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development (Amendment)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development (Amendment) 

Act 2025 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development (amendment) act 2025 (commencement) (no 2) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development (Amendment)
heading: 2. The 2nd day of October 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of October 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of section 35 of the Planning and Development 
(Amendment) Act 2025 (No. 9 of 2025) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

subsection (1) (other than paragraph (v)), and 

(b) 

subsection (2). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 October, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd October, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [453] 3
